sn23.35-45:4.2: When Venerable Rādha was seated to one side, the Buddha said to him:
sn23.35-45:4.3: “Rādha, you should give up any desire, any greed, any desire and greed for whatever is Māra.
sn23.35-45:4.7: You should give up any desire, any greed, any desire and greed for it. …
sn23.35-45:4.9: You should give up any desire, any greed, any desire and greed for it.
sn23.35-45:4.10: You should give up any desire, any greed, any desire and greed for whatever is Māra.
sn23.35-45:5.1: “You should give up any desire, any greed, any desire and greed for whatever is of Māra-like nature …”
